you know a grill temperature and the tag information could be like not just one barbecue but like many Barbecues in many
different locations uh for many different people that are owners or whatever and then the actual series data
which is in influx it's what I call a field set which is a field name could be
just like a value or something else or it could be like inner temperature outer temperature or like a temperature for
each Grill um and then the value itself and then finally a time stamp so it just so
happens that that structure that kind of schema uh works really well for iot data
